thread.section_title: Haymarket Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic hotel - Review of Haymarket Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: bugsy197211
title: Fantastic hotel
text:
Elegant hotel in a great position near Leicester Square and Piccadilly Circus. Staff were friendly and very helpful. They kindly upgraded our room and gave us a bottle of fizz as it was my wife's 40th ... these little things make a big difference. The room was spacious, beautifully set out and felt luxurious. Pool was nice ( but cool) and bar was great fun. Breakfast was superb!!
In short, we will be visiting again!
